Children Protection System

DESCRIPTION

This was my thesis project. It was a collaboration between Cyprus University of Technology and Foody.com.cy. The goal of the system was to automatically manage all delivery orders accepted by a restaurant, assign them to delivery drivers and provide them with navigations on how to deliver all orders in the most efficient way.

ARCHITECTURE AND TECHNOLOGIES USED

For this project were created two Angular Applications, a RESTful API and a Back-end PHP server using the Symfony framework. Using these technologies made possible the adoption of the MVC architecture and provided abstraction and independency between different parts of the system.
